name: Dragon Lands
description:
This game was developed during Secret Santa Jam 2020.

The game obscurely tells a tale of the return of dragon into the lands concured by demons. Take a role of a humble warrior, who stambles upon the last dragon's egg, takes care of it and with its help brings down the tyranical reign of the demon lord.

Developer: Daatster ( https://github.com/Kvinster, discord: Daatster#7749 )

Used assets:

  • Awesome art from  LPC collection and other generous art and sound contributors on opengameart ( https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-collection )
  • Free art and font assets by Kenny ( https://www.kenney.nl/assets )
  • Free art assets from Craftpix ( https://craftpix.net/ )
  • Amazing Shapes library by Freya Holmér ( https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/shapes-173167 )
  • Great Text Animator for Unity by Febucci Creations ( https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/text-animator-for-unity-158707 )

Known issues:

Waaaaaay to many to list them all. But among the most critical ones:

  • Left part of the screen is black until death. WebGL doesn't respect my screen transition material >:(
  • No real way to exit the game on PC. Alt+F4 is the way. Nope, fixed that one.
  • Hero's animation may stuck if you spam attack too hastily. If that's the case, reload the game. Pacience is the way to victory!
  • AI is dumb. We (as in humanity) are working on it.
